refnamediv.refpurpose: bind a named sampler to a texturing target

listitem.para: Specifies the index of the texture unit to which the sampler is bound.
Specifies the name of a sampler.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: glBindSampler binds sampler to the texture unit at index unit. sampler must be zero or the name of a sampler object previously returned from a call to glGenSamplers. unit must be less than the value of GL_MAX_COMBINED_TEXTURE_IMAGE_UNITS.

When a sampler object is bound to a texture unit, its state supersedes that of the texture object bound to that texture unit. If the sampler name zero is bound to a texture unit, the currently bound texture's sampler state becomes active. A single sampler object may be bound to multiple texture units simultaneously.

refsect1.title: Notes
refsect1.para: glBindSampler is available only if the GL version is 3.3 or higher.

refsect1.title: Errors
refsect1.para: GL_INVALID_VALUE is generated if unit is greater than or equal to the value of GL_MAX_COMBINED_TEXTURE_IMAGE_UNITS.
GL_INVALID_OPERATION is generated if sampler is not zero or a name previously returned from a call to glGenSamplers, or if such a name has been deleted by a call to glDeleteSamplers.
